title: Studyonovka
text:
Studyonovka () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">khutor</a>) in Romanovskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Olkhovsky%20District">Olkhovsky District</a>, <a href="Volgograd%20Oblast">Volgograd Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 20 as of 2010.
Geography.
Studyonovka is located in steppe, on the <a href="Volga%20Upland">Volga Upland</a>, on the bank of the Balykleyka River, 51 km southeast of <a href="Olkhovka%2C_Volgograd_Oblast">Olkhovka</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Romanovka is the nearest rural locality.
